function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in healthcare access due to overwhelmed healthcare systems","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and decreased quality of care","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare infrastructure and resources, implementation of telemedicine, and mass vaccination campaigns","Technologies":"Telemedicine platforms, vaccine distribution technology, and healthcare management systems","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, healthcare institutions, technology providers"},{"Description":"Failure to provide adequate protective equipment for healthcare workers","Impact":"Increased risk of infection among healthcare workers and potential spread of disease to patients","Mitigation":"Rapid production and distribution of protective equipment, development of innovative PPE designs, and implementation of strict infection control protocols","Technologies":"3D printing for PPE, automated manufacturing, IoT for infection control,","People":"Healthcare workers, patients","Owner":"Manufacturers, government, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate testing and monitoring of asymptomatic healthcare workers","Impact":"Potential spread of the virus within healthcare facilities and to vulnerable patients","Mitigation":"Regular and rapid testing of healthcare workers, implementation of contact tracing, and quarantine protocols","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, contact tracing apps, and monitoring systems","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, general population","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, government, technology providers"}]}
